    • getSecurityAccountWithFeesAndIntrerestTransactionsByTenant

      public List<Transaction> getSecurityAccountWithFeesAndIntrerestTransactionsByTenant(Integer idTenant)
      Description copied from interface: TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Retrieves all security account transactions for a tenant that include fees and interest payments.

      This method returns transactions of types ACCUMULATE, REDUCE, DIVIDEND, and FINANCE_COST for securities within the specified tenant's portfolio.

      Specified by:
      getSecurityAccountWithFeesAndIntrerestTransactionsByTenant in interface TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the unique identifier of the tenant
      Returns:
      a list of transactions including fees and interest for all security accounts belonging to the tenant

    • getTransactionsByIdPortfolio

      public List<Transaction> getTransactionsByIdPortfolio(Integer idPortfolio, Integer idTenant)
      Description copied from interface: TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Retrieves all transactions for a specific portfolio with security validation.

      This method returns all transactions (both cash and security) for a given portfolio, with proper tenant validation to ensure data security.

      Specified by:
      getTransactionsByIdPortfolio in interface TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idPortfolio - the unique identifier of the portfolio
      idTenant - the tenant ID for security validation
      Returns:
      list of all transactions within the specified portfolio, ordered by transaction time

    • updateCreateCashaccountTransfer

      @Transactional @Modifying public CashAccountTransfer updateCreateCashaccountTransfer(CashAccountTransfer cashAccountTransfer, CashAccountTransfer cashAccountTransferExisting)
      Description copied from interface: TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Creates or updates a cash account transfer with currency conversion and validation.

      This method handles the process of transferring funds between cash accounts, including currency conversion when accounts have different currencies. It validates exchange rates, calculates amounts, and creates connected withdrawal and deposit transactions.

      Specified by:
      updateCreateCashaccountTransfer in interface TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      cashAccountTransfer - the transfer details including withdrawal and deposit transactions
      cashAccountTransferExisting - the existing transfer (if updating) or null (if creating)
      Returns:
      the created/updated cash account transfer with connected transaction IDs

    • saveOnlyAttributesFormImport

      public Transaction saveOnlyAttributesFormImport(Transaction transaction, Transaction existingEntity)
      Description copied from interface: TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Saves transaction attributes optimized for bulk import operations.

      This method provides a lightweight save operation specifically designed for high-volume transaction imports. It bypasses some validation and adjustment logic to improve performance during bulk data processing.

      Specified by:
      saveOnlyAttributesFormImport in interface TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      transaction - the transaction entity to save with updated attributes
      existingEntity - the existing transaction entity (if updating) or null (if creating)
      Returns:
      the saved transaction entity with generated ID and updated timestamps

    • saveOnlyAttributes

      @Transactional @Modifying public Transaction saveOnlyAttributes(Transaction transaction, Transaction existingEntity, Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> updatePropertyLevelClasses)
      Description copied from interface: BaseRepositoryCustom
      Saves only specific attributes of an entity based on property-level update permissions. Uses annotation-based access control to determine which fields can be modified by the current user.
      Specified by:
      saveOnlyAttributes in interface BaseRepositoryCustom<Transaction>
      Parameters:
      transaction - the entity containing the new values to be saved
      existingEntity - the current entity from the database, null for new entities
      updatePropertyLevelClasses - set of annotation classes that define update permission levels
      Returns:
      the saved entity with updated attributes

    • getClosedMarginUnitsByIdTransaction

      public ClosedMarginUnits getClosedMarginUnitsByIdTransaction(Integer idTransaction)
      Description copied from interface: TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Calculates the available units for a specific margin trading position. In addition, return whether an existing opening position already has a position referencing it.

      This method analyzes margin trading transactions to determine how many units are available for a given position. It examines all connected transactions (ACCUMULATE and REDUCE types) linked to the specified transaction ID.

      Specified by:
      getClosedMarginUnitsByIdTransaction in interface TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idTransaction - the unique identifier of the margin position transaction
      Returns:
      available margin units data including position status and available units count

    • deleteSingleDoubleTransaction

      @Transactional @Modifying public void deleteSingleDoubleTransaction(Integer idTransaction)
      Description copied from interface: TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Deletes a transaction and its connected transaction if it's part of a transfer pair.

      This method handles the deletion logic for both single transactions and connected transaction pairs (such as cash account transfers). For security transactions, it validates unit integrity and adjusts holdings.

      Specified by:
      deleteSingleDoubleTransaction in interface TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idTransaction - the unique identifier of the transaction to delete

    • getTransactionForCurrencyPair

      public CurrencypairWithTransaction getTransactionForCurrencyPair(Integer idTenant, Integer idCurrencypair, boolean forChart)
      Description copied from interface: TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Retrieves currency pair transaction data for analysis and charting.

      This method returns transaction data for a specific currency pair, including the currency pair details, related transactions. When forChart is true, it also includes reverse currency pair data.

      Specified by:
      getTransactionForCurrencyPair in interface TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID to filter transactions
      idCurrencypair - the unique identifier of the currency pair
      forChart - if true, includes reverse currency pair data for comprehensive charting
      Returns:
      currency pair transaction data with calculated metrics

    • getTransactionsWithBalanceForCashaccount

      public CashaccountTransactionPosition[] getTransactionsWithBalanceForCashaccount(Integer idSecuritycashAccount, int year, int[] transactionTypes)
      Description copied from interface: TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Retrieves transaction history with running balance calculations for a specific cash account.

      This method returns an array of transaction positions that include both the transaction details and the running account balance after each transaction. When year is 0, all transactions are returned regardless of date.

      Specified by:
      getTransactionsWithBalanceForCashaccount in interface TransactionJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idSecuritycashAccount - the unique identifier of the cash account
      year - the year to filter transactions (0 for all years)
      transactionTypes - array of transaction type values to include in the results
      Returns:
      array of transaction positions with running balances, ordered chronologically
